bio: I build services from the ground up, developing robust backends and designing elegant and responsive UI/UX interfaces. I solve problems present in e-commerce ecosystem and reduce shopper friction at
wip-text: This web app is under work in progress as I work on it mostly during weekends. You can track the project progress at
about-text: Hello! My name is Gourav and I love building software that solves real world problems. Engineering has been a passion of mine since childhood, and I've made my way into the field of software engineering.
I am based out of Ranchi, Jharkhand, India and have pursued my Graduation from
My main focus these days is building solutions for e-commerce and enhance it's experience for shoppers and merchants at

Outside of my professional commitments, I engage in web application development to both refine my technical skills and stay updated with emerging technologies in the industry. Additionally, I participate in hackathons, earning recognition and prizes for my contributions. More recently, I have also begun contributing to open source projects.

experience.name: Swym
paras: I have a strong background in Shopify app development and e-commerce enhancement, with a focus on seamless integration and customization for shoppers and merchants. I played a key role in improving our company's Shopify apps by integrating external platforms like Gorgias CRM and Yotpo, significantly enhancing the app's functionality and providing a better e-commerce experience for merchants. Notably, I successfully automated a time-consuming manual workflow, reducing app installation time from days to mere minutes. Additionally, I managed data migration and the efficient import of customer data across different tiers.

Furthermore, I am currently contributing to the development of scalable service abstractions that empower developers to seamlessly integrate third-party platform solutions, resulting in a substantial boost in overall application functionality. I also designed and implemented a customized tool to automate the customer data import process, greatly improving the productivity of the customer support team. Moreover, I tackled and resolved bugs in both frontend and backend services of the Wishlist Plus app, ensuring the seamless functionality of the systems.
